subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: After winning her first Grand Slam singles title last month in New York at age 33, the Italian veteran is set to finish her playing days in style, at the W.T.A. Finals in Singapore.
snippet: After winning her first Grand Slam singles title last month in New York at age 33, the Italian veteran is set to finish her playing days in style, at the W.T.A. Finals in Singapore.
